Shivah/Kali::

"He serves to Infectrons..."said Shivah "accept or denight what???"

Kali left The forthress and walked towards her brother.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Shadow Star chuckled.
> 
> SS: Nothing....for now.  You can accept or denigh it,
> but eventually you will give your spark to me, but
> let's get off the subject for now.  If this "Bright"
> is evil I can track him down, but if he is good I will
> need directions from you.  Which side does he serve?
> 
> --- airly2000 <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Shivah::
> > 
> > "Bright" said Shivah"He attraped my master... killed
> > my sister, 
> > Alecto, and insult us... I like his head"and looking
> > to 
> > shadowstar"What's your price?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > SS chuckled at the thought of ANY Predicon,
> > Decpticon,
> > > or Infecticon (I guess the Inferno would at least
> > know
> > > all the factions) being able to resist him for
> > long.
> > > 
> > > SS:  Very well.  Name an enemy and you shall have
> > his
> > > head in your hands to mock before the sun sets.
> > >

> > > > Shivhah:
> > > > 
> > > > "I just reconize as master one bot" said the
> > male
> > > > "But I'm glad that

> > > >

> > the

> > when
> > > > > neither the Maximals nor any other bots draw
> > > > breath
> > > > > except my slaves.  Until then I am ready to
> > serve.
> > > > > LOLOLOLOLOL!
> > > > >
